attributes.action: make sure that toilets and showers on motorway services are fit for human use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The toilets and showers in most motorway service stations are a national disgace.I and many other truck and car drivers pay top dollar to park on the motorway,only to find that the toilets are in such a state that you actualy feel dirty AFTER using them.As they are granted some form of permit to operate then why can't this permit also include the state of the loos.
